original: śāntisukhaṃ yeṣāṃ te ca te prasṛmaraṃ prasāri dhyānaṃ yasminnīdṛśaṃ yadāspadaṃ kaṃdarādi

original: tāraśrīparaśaktikāmavasudhārūpānugāṃ yaṃ vidustasmai stātpraṇatirgaṇādhipataye yo rāgiṇābhyarthyate /

original: āmantrya prathamaṃ vareti varadetyārtena sarvaṃ janaṃ svāminme vaśamānayeti satataṃ svāhādibhiḥ pūjitaḥ // RMgan_2 //

original: iti pañcarūpāṇāṃ bījānāmanu gamityakṣarametādṛśaṃ yaṃ sādhakā vidustasmai gaṇādhipataye praṇatiḥ stāditi yojanā /

original: mūle kalpatarormahāmaṇimaye pīṭhe 'kṣarāmbhoruhe ṣaṭkoṇākalitatrikoṇaracanasatkarṇike 'muṃ bhaje // RMgan_3 //

original: kallolānāṃ mahormīṇāmañcalāḥ prāntāstairāśliṣṭā meghatatiryenaitādṛśa ikṣurasasamudre suradrumāṇāṃ pārijātādīnāṃ vanaṃ tadāmodena paripuṣṭe
analyzed: kallolānām mahā ūrmīṇām añcalāḥ prāntāḥ taiḥ āśliṣṭā megha tatiḥ yena etādṛśe ikṣu rasa samudre suradrumāṇām pārijāta ādīnām vanam tad āmodena paripuṣṭe

original: ratnamayaṃ dvīpaṃ vārimadhyasthalaṃ tadgatasya kalpatarormūle mahāmaṇimayaṃ pīṭhaṃ

original: kamalahastayā priyayā dakṣiṇahastenāliṅgitaṃ māṇikyapratimaṃ śoṇacchaviṃ sarveśvaraṃ mahāgaṇapatimāśāsmahe //

dāna ambhaḥ parimedura prasṛma ravi ālambi rolamba bhṛt sindūra aruṇa gaṇḍa maṇḍala yuga vyājāt praśasti dvayam

original: trailokyeṣṭāvidhānavarṇasubhagaṃ yaḥ padmarāgopamaṃ dhatte sa śriyamātanotu satataṃ devo gaṇānāṃ patiḥ // RMgan_5 //
analyzed: trailokya iṣṭa vidhāna varṇa subhagam yaḥ padmarāga upamam dhatte sa śriyam ātanotu satatam devaḥ gaṇānām patiḥ

original: dānāmbhasā madāmbunā parimeduraṃ vyāptaṃ prasṛmarānvyālambino rolambānbhramarānbibhartīti prasṛmaravyālambirolambabhṛt /
analyzed: dāna ambhasā mada ambunā parimeduram vyāptam prasṛmarān vyālambinaḥ rolambān bhramarān bibharti iti prasṛmara vyālambi rolamba bhṛt
sindūreṇa aruṇam etādṛśam kumbha pradeśa dvayam tasya miṣāt trailokya iṣṭavidha anvarṇa subhagam tribhuvana śubha vidhi akṣara manojñam

original: padmarāgopamaṃ padmarāgo lohitakastadupamaṃ praśastidvayaṃ yo dhatte sa gaṇānāṃ patirdevaḥ satataṃ śriyamātanotu /
analyzed: padmarāga upamam padmarāgaḥ lohitakaḥ tad upamam praśasti dvayam yaḥ dhatte sa gaṇānām patiḥ devaḥ satatam śriyam ātanotu
yathā mṛd ambu lipte dāru phalake rakta cūrṇam dattvā akṣarāṇi

original: tathā dānāmbulipte sindūravati kumbhasthale bhramarā ityuktaṃ bhavati //

original: śuṇḍāpradhṛtasuvarṇakalaśasaṃgṛhītena kṣaratā bahutvādbahirapi nirgacchatā muktāmāṇikyādiratnasamūhena koṭiśaḥ sādhakajanānsaṃbhāvayannasaṃkhyātānupāsakānsaṃpadā  #

original: herambaṃ praṇamāmi yasya purataḥ śāṇḍilyamūle śriyā bibhratyāmburuhe samaṃ madhuripuste śaṅkhacakre vahan /

original: nyagrodhasya tale sahādrisutayā śaṃbhustayā dakṣiṇe bibhrāṇaḥ paraśuṃ triśūlamitayā pāśāṅkuśābhyāṃ śubham // RMgan_9 //

original: śāṇḍilyamūle bilvavṛkṣasyādho yasya mahāgaṇapateḥ purato 'grabhāge padme bibhratyā śriyā samaṃ te prasiddhe śaṅkhacakre vahanmadhuripurviṣṇurasti
analyzed: śāṇḍilya mūle bilva vṛkṣasya adhas yasya mahāgaṇapateḥ puratas gra bhāge padme bibhratyā śriyā samam te prasiddhe śaṅkha cakre vahan madhuripuḥ viṣṇuḥ asti

original: tathā yasya dakṣiṇe nyagrodhasya tale vaṭavṛkṣādhaḥ pāśāṅkuśābhyāmitayā sahitayādrisutayā pārvatyā saha paraśuṃ triśūlaṃ ca bibhrāṇaḥ śaṃbhuḥ  #
analyzed: tathā yasya dakṣiṇe nyagrodhasya tale vaṭa vṛkṣa adhas pāśa aṅkuśābhyām itayā sahitayā adrisutayā pārvatyā saha paraśum triśūlam ca bibhrāṇaḥ śaṃbhuḥ
śivaḥ sti

original: paścātpippalamāśrito ratipatirdevasya ratyotpale bibhratyā samamaikṣavaṃ dhanuriṣūnpauṣpānvahanpañca ca /
analyzed: paścāt pippalam āśritaḥ ratipatiḥ devasya ratyā utpale bibhratyā samam aikṣavam dhanuḥ iṣūn pauṣpān vahan pañca ca

original: vāme cakragadādharaḥ sa bhagavānkroḍaḥ priyaṃgostale hastodyacchukaśālimañjarikayā devyā dharaṇyā saha // RMgan_10 //
analyzed: vāme cakra gadā dharaḥ sa bhagavān kroḍaḥ priyaṃgoḥ tale hasta udyat śuka śāli mañjarikayā devyā dharaṇyā saha

original: devasya paścime pippalavṛkṣasyādha utpale bibhratyā ratyā samamaikṣavaṃ dhanuḥ pañca pauṣpāniṣūṃśca vahan ratipatiḥ kāmadevo 'sti /
analyzed: devasya paścime pippala vṛkṣasya adhas utpale bibhratyā ratyā samam aikṣavam dhanuḥ pañca pauṣpān iṣūn ca vahan ratipatiḥ kāmadevaḥ sti

original: asya ca vāme priyaṃguvṛkṣādho hastodyacchukaśālimañjarikayaikasminkare kīramanyatra
analyzed: asya ca vāme priyaṃgu vṛkṣa adhas hasta udyat śuka śāli mañjarikayā ekasmin kare kīram anyatra

original: kalamakaṇiśaṃ bibhratyā dharaṇyā saha sa prasiddho bhagavānkroḍo varāho 'sti taṃ
analyzed: kalama kaṇiśam bibhratyā dharaṇyā saha sa prasiddhaḥ bhagavān kroḍaḥ varāhaḥ sti tam
herambam praṇamāmi iti pūrveṇa anvayaḥ

original: ṣaṭkoṇāśriṣu ṣaṭsu ṣaḍ gajamukhāḥ pāśāṅkuśābhīvarānbibhrāṇāḥ pramadāsakhāḥ pṛthumahāśoṇāśmapuñjatviṣaḥ /
analyzed: ṣaṣ koṇa aśriṣu ṣaṭsu ṣaṭ gaja mukhāḥ pāśa aṅkuśa abhīvarān bibhrāṇāḥ pramadā sakhāḥ pṛthu mahā śoṇa aśma puñja tviṣaḥ

original: āmodaḥ purataḥ pramodasumukhau taṃ cābhito durmukhaḥ paścātpārśvagato 'sya vighna iti yo vighnakarteti ca // RMgan_11 //
analyzed: āmodaḥ puratas pramoda sumukhau tam ca abhitas durmukhaḥ paścāt pārśva gataḥ sya vighnaḥ iti yaḥ vighna kartā iti ca

original: ṣaṭkoṇasya pīṭhasya ṣaṭsvaśriṣu pālīṣu ṣaḍ gajamukhā dhyeyāḥ /
analyzed: ṣaṣ koṇasya pīṭhasya ṣaṭsu aśriṣu pālīṣu ṣaṭ gajamukhāḥ dhyeyāḥ

original: āmodādigaṇeśvarapriyatamāstatraiva nityaṃ sthitāḥ kāntāśleṣarasajñamantharadṛśaḥ siddhiḥ samṛddhistataḥ /
analyzed: āmoda ādi gaṇeśvara priyatamāḥ tatra eva nityam sthitāḥ kānta āśleṣa rasa jña manthara dṛśaḥ siddhiḥ samṛddhiḥ tatas

original: kāntiryā madanāvatītyapi tathā kalpeṣu yā gīyate sānyā yāpi madadravā tadaparā drāviṇyamūḥ pūjitāḥ // RMgan_12 //
analyzed: kāntiḥ yā madanāvatī iti api tathā kalpeṣu yā gīyate sā anyā yā api mada dravā tad aparā drāviṇī amūḥ pūjitāḥ

original: kāntasya svasvabharturāliṅganarasaṃ jānantyata eva mantharā rāgiṇī dṛgyāsāṃ tāḥ /
analyzed: kāntasya sva sva bhartuḥ āliṅgana rasam jānanti atas eva mantharā rāgiṇī dṛś yāsām tāḥ

original: āmodādīnāṃ pūrvaślokoktānāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ bhāryāsteṣāṃ samīpe sthitā dhyeyāḥ /
analyzed: āmoda ādīnām pūrva śloka uktānām ṣaṇṇām bhāryāḥ teṣām samīpe sthitāḥ dhyeyāḥ

original: āśliṣṭau vasudhetyatho vasumatī tābhyāṃ sitālohitau varṣantau vasu pārśvayorvilasatastau śaṅkhapadmau nidhī /
analyzed: āśliṣṭau vasudhā iti atho vasumatī tābhyām sita ālohitau varṣantau vasu pārśvayoḥ vilasataḥ tau śaṅkha padmau nidhī

original: aṅgānyanvatha mātaraśca paritaḥ śakrādayo 'bjāśrayāstadbāhye kuliśādayaḥ paripatatkālānalajyotiṣaḥ // RMgan_13 //
analyzed: aṅgāni anu atha mātaraḥ ca paritas śakra ādayaḥ bja āśrayāḥ tad bāhye kuliśa ādayaḥ paripatat kāla anala jyotiṣaḥ

original: vasudhayā vasumatyā ca krameṇāliṅgitau śuklaraktavarṇau dhanaṃ varṣantau tau śaṅkhapadmasaṃjñau prasiddhau nidhī ṣaṭkoṇapārśvayorvilasataḥ
analyzed: vasudhayā vasumatyā ca krameṇa āliṅgitau śukla rakta varṇau dhanam varṣantau tau śaṅkha padma saṃjñau prasiddhau nidhī ṣaṭkoṇa pārśvayoḥ vilasataḥ
tayoḥ dhyānam kuryāt iti artha ha
anu nidhi dhyāna anantaram hṛdayāni ṣaḍaṅgāni dhyāyet
paritas brāhmī ādyāḥ aṣṭa mātaraḥ dhyeyāḥ

original: ṣaṭkoṇādbahiḥsthite 'ṣṭadalakamala indrādayo dikpālāstadbāhye teṣāṃ samīpa eva paripatatkālānalajyotiṣaḥ pradīptasvarūpā indrādīnāṃ hetayo  #
analyzed: ṣaṭkoṇāt bahis sthite ṣṭadala kamale indra ādayaḥ dikpālāḥ tad bāhye teṣām samīpe eva paripatat kāla anala jyotiṣaḥ pradīpta svarūpāḥ indra ādīnām hetayaḥ
vajra ādyāḥ dhyeyāḥ
viṣṇu śiva ādi tattva tanave śrīvakratuṇḍāya huṃkāra ākṣipta samasta daitya pṛtanā vrātāya dīpta tviṣe

original: ānandaikarasāvabodhalaharīvidhvastasarvormaye sarvatra prathamānamugdhamahase tasmai parasmai namaḥ // RMgan_14 //
analyzed: ānanda eka rasa avabodha laharī vidhvasta sarva ūrmaye sarvatra pratha māna mugdha mahase tasmai parasmai namaḥ
herambam praṇamāmi
iti ślokābhyām viṣṇu śiva ādi svarūpaiḥ tanuḥ mūrtiḥ yasya sa tasmai
ādi padāt smara kroḍau
huṃkāra mātreṇa nirasta samasta asura sainya samūhāya dīpta kāntaye
ānanda iti
niratiśaya sukha sphuraṇa taraṅgaiḥ dūrīkṛta saṃpūrṇa ūrmaye
ūrmayaḥ ṣaṣ bhāva vikārāḥ
te ca jāyate
asti
vardhate
vipariṇamate
apakṣīyate
naśyati iti ca

original: ānandaikarasāvayodhalaharībhirvidhvastāḥ sarveṣāṃ sādhakānāmūrmayaḥ ṣaḍindriyajanyā vṛttayo yasmādityeke /
analyzed: ānanda eka rasa avayodha laharībhiḥ vidhvastāḥ sarveṣām sādhakānām ūrmayaḥ ṣaṣ indriya janyāḥ vṛttayaḥ yasmāt iti eke
ūrmi śabdena avidyā ādayaḥ yoga śāstra prasiddhāḥ kleśāḥ

original: sarvatra prathamānaṃ mugdhaṃ sundaraṃ maho yasya tasmai parasmai jagato 'nyasmai namaḥ //
analyzed: sarvatra prathamānam mugdham sundaram mahaḥ yasya tasmai parasmai jagataḥ nyasmai namaḥ
sevā hevāki deva asura nara nikara sphāra koṭīra koṭī koṭi vyāṭīka māna dyumaṇi sama maṇi śreṇi bhāveṇikānām

original: rājannīrājanaśrīsakhacaraṇanakhadyotavidyotamānaḥ śreyaḥ stheyaḥ sa deyānmama vimaladṛśo bandhuraṃ sindhurāsyaḥ // RMgan_15 //
analyzed: rājan nīrājana śrī sakha caraṇa nakha dyota vidyotamānaḥ śreyaḥ stheyaḥ sa deyāt mama vimala dṛśaḥ bandhuram sindhura āsyaḥ
sevāyām hevākaḥ bhilāṣaḥ yeṣām
aham agre ham agre bhavāmi iti icchā
ahaṃpūrvikā iti yāvat

original: te ca te devāsuranarāṇāṃ samūhāsteṣāṃ dedīpyamānamukuṭāgrāṇāṃ yā koṭiḥ saṃkhyāviśeṣastatra vyāṭīkamānāḥ susaṃgatāḥ sūryatulyaratnapaṅktikāntipravāhāsteṣām
analyzed: te ca te deva asura narāṇām samūhāḥ teṣām dedīpyamāna mukuṭa agrāṇām yā koṭiḥ saṃkhyā viśeṣaḥ tatra vyāṭīka mānāḥ su saṃgatāḥ sūrya tulya ratna paṅkti kānti pravāhāḥ teṣām

original: rājantī nīrājanaśrīrārātrikaśobhā tasyāḥ sakhāyaste ca te caraṇanakhāśca teṣāṃ dyotena prakāśena vidyotamānaḥ sa prasiddhaḥ sindhurāsyo gajamukhaḥ
analyzed: rājantī nīrājana śrīḥ ārātrika śobhā tasyāḥ sakhāyaḥ te ca te caraṇa nakhāḥ ca teṣām dyotena prakāśena vidyotamānaḥ sa prasiddhaḥ sindhuḥ āsyaḥ gaja mukhaḥ
he vimala dṛśaḥ paṇḍitāḥ

original: mama bandhuraṃ ramyaṃ stheyaḥ sthirataraṃ śreyaḥ kalyāṇaṃ deyāt /
analyzed: mama bandhuram ramyam stheyaḥ sthirataram śreyaḥ kalyāṇam deyāt
mama iti asya vā vimala dṛśaḥ iti viśeṣaṇam
vimala dṛśā

original: iti pāṭhe tu saumyāvalokanena śreyo dadyādityarthaḥ //
analyzed: iti pāṭhe tu saumya avalokanena śreyaḥ dadyāt iti arthaḥ
etena prakaṭa rahasya mantra mālā garbheṇa sphuṭatara saṃvidā stavena

original: yaḥ stauti pracurataraṃ mahāgaṇeśaṃ tasyeyaṃ bhavati vaśaṃvadā trilokī // RMgan_16 //
analyzed: yaḥ stauti pracurataram mahā gaṇeśam tasya iyam bhavati vaśaṃvadā trilokī
sphuṭatara saṃvidā iti anena stotre prasāda guṇaḥ sūcitaḥ
pracurataraḥ muhur muhur
anyat spaṣṭam

original: // iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryavaryaśrīrāghavacaitanyaviracitaṃ mahāgaṇapatistotraṃ tacchiṣyakṛtayā ṭippaṇyā sametaṃ samāptam //
analyzed: iti śrīmat paramahaṃsa parivrājaka ācārya varya śrī rāghavacaitanya viracitam mahāgaṇapatistotram tad śiṣya kṛtayā ṭippaṇyā sametam samāptam
